text: A rum cocktail is a cocktail that contains light or dark rum. Many rum cocktails have a tropical theme. ==Examples== ===Duos=== *Dark 'n' Stormy (rum and ginger beer) *Rum and Coke ===Trios=== *Cable Car (rum, orange curacao, lemon sour) *Caipirinha (lime, cachaça, sugar) *Daiquiri (rum, lime juice, simple syrup) *El Floridita (white rum, lime, maraschino) *Piña colada (light rum, pineapple juice, cream of coconut) *Shark bite (coconut rum, pineapple juice, blue curaçao) *Spiked blackberry lemonade (rum, lemon juice, blackberry simple syrup) *Yaka Hula Hickey Dula (dark rum, dry vermouth, pineapple juice) ===Others=== *Caribbean coco (El Dorado 3 Year rum, Clément Coco rhum, coconut milk-based yogurt, simple syrup, lime juice, Angostura Bitters) *Dole whip (coconut rum, pineapple, coconut milk, sweetened condensed milk) *Electric shark (rum, blue curaçao, pineapple juice, ginger beer) *Hot buttered rum (dark rum, vanilla extract, brown sugar, butter, and a combination of winter spices) *Hurricane (light and dark rums, passion fruit, orange and lime juices, simple syrup, and grenadine) *Jungle Bird (dark rum, campari, simple syrup, pineapple juice, lime juice) *La Cola Nostra (rhum agricole, averna amaro, lime juice, simple syrup, pimento dram, prosecco) *Lamborn (silver rum, pea juice, lime juice, jasmine syrup) *Maracuya mistress (black rhum agricole, passion fruit juice, hibiscus syrup, lime juice) *Mojito (rum, mint, lime, sugar, and soda) *Raspberry rum mule (rum, lime juice, agave, raspberries, ginger beer, ice) *Rum dum (pale rum, amber rum, egg white, lemon juice, sugar) *Snap, chat & rum (rum, lime juice, simple syrup, sugar snap pea with fennel bulb) *Spicy ancho chile daiquiri (rum, Ancho Reyes Verde, lime juice, simple syrup) *Strawberry daiquiri (light rum, fresh strawberries, frozen strawberries, lime juice) *Tropical escape (white rum, grapefruit juice, orgeat syrup, aromatic bitters) *Wiki wiki (rhum, mango brandy, lime juice, pineapple juice, cane syrup, kiwi) ==References== Category:Cocktails with rum
title: Rum cocktail
